text: Christopher Stephen Grayling (born 1 April 1962) is an English politician and former Secretary of State for Transportation. He is the Member of Parliament for the Epsom and Ewell constituency in the United Kingdom. He was first elected in the 2001 general election. He is a member of the Conservative Party. ==Privy Council== He was appointed as a Privy Counsellor on 9 June 2010. == References == Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the British House of Commons for English constituencies Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs
title: Chris Grayling
